moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Dire Hit All
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Sixth Sense!
moves.effect: Restores a bit of an ally’s HP. Drastically raises an ally’s Sp. Atk. Raises an ally’s accuracy.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.effect: Reduces physical damage done to the allied field of play.

syncMove.name: ESP Prodigy Psywave
syncMove.description: Become Mega Alakazam until the end of battle.

passives.name: Speedy Entry 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s Speed when the Pokémon enters a battle.
